data.text: Jop mɨkemegha gɨvazɨ, Temanɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazim Elifas kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze:
“Jop, kɨ ghaze, nɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim itim.
Nɨ e adogha ghuavɨra iti,
Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamaghɨn amiba, gumazamizibagh amima,
Nɨ arazir kuram gami, ezɨ bizir kam nɨ gamima nɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kabagh ami,
Nɨ tuisɨghamin arazim, a nan ingangarim puvatɨ.
“Ezɨ manmaghɨn ami?
Jop, God uan Nguibamɨn enselba akuvagha me ko mɨgɨrɨgɨabagh ami, ezɨ nɨ dughiar kamɨn uaghan ikia oraghiz, o?
Nɨn fofozim en fofozim gafirazir puvatɨ.
Gumazir ghurir ghurapaniba e ko iti.
“Jop, God nɨn mɨzazim amɨrvaghasav ami, eghtɨ nɨn navim amɨragh nɨmɨra ikiam.
Nɨ dɨgavir kuram gamigha navir averiamɨn aven Godɨn atara damazimning atiaghɨrɨgha gari,
“Gumazamiziba Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir puvatɨ.
E gumazamiziba, enselba e gafira, ezɨ God men arazibar gari, da derazir puvatɨ.
Ezɨ e nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba, e tong bar derazir puvatɨ.
“Jop, nɨ deravɨra kuarim atɨgh nan mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baragh.
Kɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozir aghuim itir gumazamiziba da fofozir kam ini.
Gumazamizir kaba uan nguazimra iti.
“Nan mɨgɨrɨgɨam kamakɨn:
Me nɨgɨniba barazir dughiabar, me bar puvɨram atiati.
Me fo, bizir kuraba otiv bar me avam, mati mɨtarmem nguazim avara.
Me dagheba buriagh arui, ezɨ dagheba itir puvatɨ.
Men nɨghnɨziba derazir puvatɨ, me pazavɨra nɨghnɨgha bar atiatingi.
“Me ifaghata ghaze, me Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim bar a gafira,
Mati me mɨdorozir korotiam arugha, mɨdorozir oramɨn suiragha
Me datɨrɨghɨn deravɨra ikiava mɨkarziba bui,
Ezɨ nguibar ekiar me datɨrɨghɨn itiba ikuvigham,
Eghtɨ men dagɨaba ko biziba bar gevegham.
Me mɨtarmer osɨmtɨzir ekiar kam gitaghan kogham.
Me ifavarir arazimɨn suiraghavɨra ikia ghaze,
Egh me azenir avɨribar ikeghan kogh ovengam,
Gumazamizir kaba ingangarir avɨribagh ami, ezɨ da deraghavɨram otivir puvatɨ.
Gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨziba, men adarazi pura ikiam.
Ifavaribagh amir arazir guar avɨribar nɨghnɨzim, men navir averiabar otifi,
